title: Backup & Restore
description: Create full system backups and restore from previous snapshots. Backups include all database data and disk files.

create.title: Create Backup
create.description: Export all skills, agents, traces, sessions, and disk files into a downloadable ZIP archive.
create.includeEnvWarning: The .env file may contain API keys and secrets. Only include it for private backups.

restore.title: Restore from Backup
restore.description: Upload a backup ZIP file to restore all data. This will replace ALL existing data.
restore.confirmWarning: This will DELETE all existing data and replace it with the backup contents. This action cannot be undone.
restore.confirmMessage: All current skills, agents, traces, and sessions will be permanently removed and replaced. A safety snapshot of the current state will be created automatically before restoring.
restore.dragDrop: Drag and drop a backup ZIP file here

list.title: Available Backups
list.emptyDescription: Create your first backup to get started.
